oai_dc:dc.dc:description: About the hunting of game and the eating of flesh of certain game beforehand, such as eating slow-moving rather than fast game when going off to hunt. 1) Date on p.5304: 23 September; p.5312: 24 September, 2) p.5300v: this story was told to Dia!kwain by his mother (=kamme-an), 3) This story is found in Book V-17.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !nanna-sse (hunting observances)
